name: Last Stonelord
description: Last Stonelord is an Old school Rpg , inspired by games like Ultima online and Warcraft!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP sp2 Processor: core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel-HD-Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10   64 bit Processor: core i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: nvdia gtx 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
